remarks: A factor of a nonzero complex number is nonzero.  Partial converse of ~ mulne0d and consequence of ~ mulne0bd .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
mulne0bad.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulne0bad.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulne0bad.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) =/= 0 ) $.
mulne0bbd $p |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
